example.description: This example cancels the specified Spot fleet request and terminates the associated Spot instances.

example.code: PS C:\> Stop-EC2SpotFleetRequest -SpotFleetRequestId sfr-73fbd2ce-aa30-494c-8788-1cee4EXAMPLE -TerminateInstance $false This example cancels the specified Spot fleet request without terminating the associated Spot instances.
